name: Food Game (Itsrisible)
description:
Get ready to click on some food eat some delicious food but be careful that there are some dangerous foods  all foods are good in this one! Ranging from apples to salads to blueberry pies and more! also don't forget the poison ivy  toxic butter and literal stop signs  Trust us the food we litter from the sky  we find, harvest, and make is 10/10!

Nothing much else too say
